Articles.Content:
Hello,

Flying aircraft near the KSC (above 1000m)....I go EVA and then 'Let Go'...Press 'P' for parachute deployment...Deploys no problem...however I have no

control whatsoever with the ASDW keys.

Any advice direction would be appreciated!

Thank You!
I think think this is a bug. Because I can do this just fine. If it comes up again I would recommend reporting on the Squad Bugtracker.  Kerbal Space program 1.12.1 has a lot of bugs.
If you got your game from Steam, it's always a good idea to validate your game download when really odd things like this happen.
